comments.en:
Dye-sublimation photo printer, full 24-bit color depth (256 levels per CMY color component), full-bleed (border-less). 310dpi, 4in/10cm width roll paper (max. 4x7in/18x10cm). Produces laboratory-like photos. Does not print on normal paper.

TV connector, so the printer can also be used to show digital photos without PC.

Memory card reader for printing from the camera's memory cards, selection of pictures vis TV.

Consumables/Refills:
